description:
Pamper yourself with this light and floral fragrance, camellia, magnolia and jasmine notes are blended with white musk for a delicate scent.

Palmolive Luminous Oils Invigorating Macadamia Oil with Peony is made with 100% natural peony oil. This nongreasy hand wash gently, yet thoroughly cleanses your hands and removes germs.

Contains More of what you love, and less of what you don't.

That's why this liquid hand wash is free from:
- No Parabens.
- No Phthalates.
- No Mineral oil.
- No Alcohol.
- No Soap.
- No Animal Derived Ingredients.
- No Gluten.
- No Silicones.
- No BPA.

Please recycle. This bottle is recyclable, made with 48% less plastic*.

Palmolive Luminous Oils Invigorating Hand Wash is suitable for the bathroom, kitchen and laundry.

Size: 1L Refill
Better for your wallet, and better for the planet*.

* vs 2 x Palmolive Luminous Oils 500mL Hand Wash Pumps



Product Features:

  • Invigorating Hand Wash: Indulge in a daily treat for your hands with Palmolive Luminous Oils Invigorating Hand wash pump that removes germs and cleanses hands
  • Natural Extracts: infused with natural essential oils and citrus extracts to gently cleanse hands.
  • Rejuvenate The Senses: with the rich blend of Macadamia Oil with Peony in this non greasy hand wash formula
  • Where To Use: Palmolive Luminous Oils Invigorating Hand Wash in the bathroom, kitchen and laundry
  • Recyclable: The Palmolive Luminous Oils Hand Wash bottles are recyclable.
name: Palmolive 1L
